items.name: Sanna karapusa (150 grams)
items.description: Enjoy Sanna Karapusa—150g pack for just ₹80! Grab your tasty, homemade snack today.Crispy, lightly spiced South Indian sev, made fresh in small batches with the finest ingredients. A classic tea-time snack, perfect for sharing with family or as an anytime treat.

items.name: Pappu vunda (1 packet)
items.description: Traditional peanut chikki, made with premium groundnuts and pure jaggery for a crunchy, wholesome sweet bite. Each piece is handmade in small batches by local women chefs, bringing you the classic taste of Andhra in every bite.
